snippet: A Philippine court says it has ordered the arrest of Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, meaning her likely return to detention.
abstract: Philippine court orders arrest of former Pres Gloria Macapagal Arroyo on plunder charges, meaning a likely return to detention; Arroyo had posted bail in July following about seven months of confinement.
lead_paragraph: A Philippine court says it has ordered the arrest of Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, meaning her likely return to detention.

headline.main: In Philippines, Warrant for Former President
